dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: The Librispeech corpus contains 960 hours of labeled speech. 80-dimensional filter bank features are extracted from a 25 ms window with a stride of 10 ms. SpecAugment is applied with mask parameter F = 27, ten time masks with maximum time-mask ratio ps = 0.05, and speed perturbation.
dcterms:title: Librispeech

dcterms:description: The in-house training set combines two sources: 20K hours of English video data publicly shared by Facebook users and 20K hours of manually transcribed de-identified English data in the voice assistant domain, resulting in 83M utterances (145K hours).
dcterms:title: Large-Scale In-House Data

dcterms:description: VA1 is an in-house test set consisting of 10.2K hand-transcribed de-identified short-form utterances (less than five words on average) in the voice assistant domain, collected from internal volunteers.
dcterms:title: VA1 (in-house test set)

dcterms:description: VA2 is an in-house test set consisting of 44.2K hand-transcribed de-identified short-form utterances in the voice assistant domain, collected by a third-party data vendor.
dcterms:title: VA2 (in-house test set)
